display_long_description:
Ancient shamans intuitively understood the power of the mind and their performances would conjure  the body’s innate ability to heal. Modern medicine accomplishes a similar performance with lab coats and pills. We are beginning to understand that technology can be employed to similar ends.

Visitations makes use of techniques such as binaural beats, strobing, form constants, and includes body scan meditation, dream induction, and music developed by artists skilled in the healing arts.

These techniques have been shown to directly alter the physiological state of the brain.

Users may customize experiences to their needs, which may include:

· Inner Journeys
· Relaxation/Focus
· Mood Modification
· Mini-Vacations
· Mindfulness
· Distraction Therapy
· Infusion Therapy
· Mental Reset
· Meditation Assistance
